Package ch.ethz.vizzly.cache

Class Summary
AbstractCache This class defines the interfaces that any cache implementation must follow.
CacheConfiguration This class implements a simple data type for assigning a aggregation window length to a cache implementation
CacheManager This class implements the actual caching strategy.
CacheUpdateWorkerSynchronization This class synchronizes multiple, concurrently running worker threads that are used for continuously pulling new data.
CacheUpdateWorkerThread This class implements a thread that updated cached contents.
